EmailTemplate.name: Promotion credit template French
EmailTemplate.subject: Promotion **** - Credit (billing #) - (Customer Name from registration)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contract.Account},
Now that your warranty case {!Case.CaseNumber} is approved it is our pleasure to provide you with the attached credit note {!AcctSeed__Project__c.AcctSeedERP__Work_Order_Number__c} to resolve this claim.
If there are any questions or concerns please contact our Dealer Care Team.
Thank you,
{!User.Username} Dealer Care Specialist dealercare@legendboats.com Tel # (888) 345-4756
